## Comment Installer

1.  **Importer le Flux de Travail :** T√©l√©chargez le fichier `.json` et importez-le dans votre instance n8n.
2.  **Configurer Bright Data :** Ajoutez vos identifiants Bright Data au n≈ìud Bright Data.
3.  **Configurer le Stockage des Donn√©es :** Configurez o√π vous souhaitez stocker les donn√©es sur les propri√©t√©s.
4.  **Personnaliser :** Sp√©cifiez les emplacements, les types de propri√©t√©s et le format du rapport.

## Cas d'Utilisation

parameters.content:
=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

# üìä **Commercial Real Estate Weekly Report Automation**

This automation helps you **scrape commercial property listings** (like office and retail spaces) from top websites using **Bright Data**, and automatically stores that data into a **Google Sheet**, ready for reporting or analysis.

---

## üîπ **SECTION 1: üîÅ Automate + Scrape Listings**

### üß© 1. üìÜ Weekly Market Trigger

**Node Name:** `Weekly Market Trigger`
**What it does:**
This node automatically starts the workflow every week (e.g., Monday at 8 AM). You don't have to press a button ‚Äî it just runs in the background.

üß† **Beginner Benefit:**

> Automate your market research without ever missing a week. Set it once and let it run!

---

### üß© 2. üåê Fetch Listings via Bright Data

**Node Name:** `Fetch Listings via Bright Data`
**What it does:**
This node sends a `POST` request to **Bright Data Web Unlocker API**, which is a tool that bypasses captchas, anti-bot systems, and complex JavaScript-loaded pages to give you clean HTML content.

**It targets a URL like:**

```
https://www.loopnet.com/for-lease/office/san-francisco-ca/
```

üõ°Ô∏è Bright Data ensures the page is accessed as if it's being opened by a real user ‚Äî no blocks, no errors.

üß† **Beginner Benefit:**

> Even if a website has bot protections or hidden content, this node ensures you can access the data consistently and safely.

---

## üî∏ **SECTION 2: üß± Extract + Save Listings**

### üß© 3. üß± Extract Listing Details (HTML)

**Node Name:** `Extract Listing Details (HTML)`
**What it does:**
It scans the HTML content from the Bright Data response and pulls out important fields like:

* üè¢ Property Title
* üíµ Price
* üìç Address
* üìê Size
* üîó Link to the listing

Uses **CSS selectors** like `.listing-title` or `.price-info` to find this info.

üß† **Beginner Benefit:**

> This node turns messy website code into clean, structured data you can actually use in a report or analysis.

---

### üß© 4. üìä Save to Google Sheets

**Node Name:** `Save to Google Sheets`
**What it does:**
This final step **appends each extracted listing** into a Google Sheet in real time.

You‚Äôll get a spreadsheet like this:

| Title | Price | Address | Size | URL |
| ----- | ----- | ------- | ---- | --- |

üß† **Beginner Benefit:**

> Your scraped data is saved instantly where you can filter, chart, or share it with clients or your team.

---

## üöÄ **What You Can Do With This Workflow**

* üìà Track weekly commercial real estate trends
* üß† Compare price per square foot by neighborhood
* üì® Send reports to clients or investors
* üîÅ Use Google Sheets to trigger visual dashboards

---

## üéÅ Want to Make It Better?

* Add a ‚úâÔ∏è **Slack or Email notification** node at the end
* Use a ü™Ñ **Markdown Generator** to create beautiful weekly summaries
* Append data to **separate tabs by week** for historical tracking

---

## üîπ **SECTION 1: üîÅ Automate + Scrape Listings**

### üß© 1. üìÜ Weekly Market Trigger

**Node Name:** `Weekly Market Trigger`
**What it does:**
This node automatically starts the workflow every week (e.g., Monday at 8 AM). You don't have to press a button ‚Äî it just runs in the background.

üß† **Beginner Benefit:**

> Automate your market research without ever missing a week. Set it once and let it run!

---

### üß© 2. üåê Fetch Listings via Bright Data

**Node Name:** `Fetch Listings via Bright Data`
**What it does:**
This node sends a `POST` request to **Bright Data Web Unlocker API**, which is a tool that bypasses captchas, anti-bot systems, and complex JavaScript-loaded pages to give you clean HTML content.

**It targets a URL like:**

```
https://www.loopnet.com/for-lease/office/san-francisco-ca/
```

üõ°Ô∏è Bright Data ensures the page is accessed as if it's being opened by a real user ‚Äî no blocks, no errors.

üß† **Beginner Benefit:**

> Even if a website has bot protections or hidden content, this node ensures you can access the data consistently and safely.

---

## üî∏ **SECTION 2: üß± Extract + Save Listings**

### üß© 3. üß± Extract Listing Details (HTML)

**Node Name:** `Extract Listing Details (HTML)`
**What it does:**
It scans the HTML content from the Bright Data response and pulls out important fields like:

* üè¢ Property Title
* üíµ Price
* üìç Address
* üìê Size
* üîó Link to the listing

Uses **CSS selectors** like `.listing-title` or `.price-info` to find this info.

üß† **Beginner Benefit:**

> This node turns messy website code into clean, structured data you can actually use in a report or analysis.

---

### üß© 4. üìä Save to Google Sheets

**Node Name:** `Save to Google Sheets`
**What it does:**
This final step **appends each extracted listing** into a Google Sheet in real time.

You‚Äôll get a spreadsheet like this:

| Title | Price | Address | Size | URL |
| ----- | ----- | ------- | ---- | --- |

üß† **Beginner Benefit:**

> Your scraped data is saved instantly where you can filter, chart, or share it with clients or your team.

---
